pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====================================================Common workflow language standalone document upgrader=====================================================This is a standalone upgrader for Common Workflow Language documents fromversion ``draft-3``, ``v1.0``, and ``v1.1`` to ``v1.2``.See https://github.com/sbg/sevenbridges-cwl-draft2-upgrader for upgrading from ``sbg:draft-2``.It does not check for correctness of the input document, for that one can use`the CWL reference implementation <https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltool>`_ (``cwltool --validate``).This is written and tested for Python 3.6, 3.7, 3.8, 3.9, and 3.10.Install-------Installing the official package from PyPI:: pip install cwl-upgraderOr from source:: git clone https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwl-upgrader.git pip install ./cwl-upgrader/Run on the command line-----------------------:: cwl-upgrader path-to-cwl-document [another-path-to-cwl-document ...]
